full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN MA YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO LA STONG MCHOD 'BUL TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES RJE BTZUN MA YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO LA STONG MCHOD 'BUL TSUL 'DI NI DPE MA 'JOM PA DANG BSDEBS MI SHES PA'I BYANG 'DREN RNAMS LA PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS, ,^ ZHVA SER COD PAN 'DZIN PA LCANG LUNG AARYA PAndI TAR GRAGS PAS GNAS MCHOG BSOD NAMS KUN SDUD GLING GI BLA BRANG DU BRIS PA DGE ,SHU BHAm, ,BHA WANTU, ,)
